title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Mar. 28, 1895. Kosciusko Monument Fund Continues to Get Support

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Mar. 28, 1895. KOSCIUSKO MONUMENT FUND CONTINUES TO GET SUPPORT

body.p: The following donations have been received for the Kosciusko Monument Fund:
T. Szoczynski made a collection at Miss Mary Zwierzycka's wedding; the collection netted $9.30.
E. Z. Zmudzinski of Brooklyn, New York, gave $1.00.
F. A. Figler of Buffalo, New York, gave $3.30.
These bring the total number of contributions to 5,406, and a total sum collected to $7,707.54.
